songs.title: About “Die Young” - Commentary
songs.lyrics: My new single "Die Young" is a song I'm really proud of, because I worked for a long time on this record and I wrote so many songs, so after having 50 songs we narrowed it down to this one to be my first single. And I really love the sentiment of the song, it's all about how you should live every single day and every single night as if it's your last. 'Cause you really never know how life goes, and no matter how old I get I will always remain young at heart.
